publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4 Christine Grahame: Borders Railway—That the Parliament endorses the commitment by its predecessor on 1 June 2000 to reinstate the Borders railway from Edinburgh to Carlisle; notes the Liberal Democrats' election pledge to fund this line, and therefore expects all parties within the Executive to make an unequivocal commitment to finance the line.

S2M-4 Christine Grahame: Borders Railway—That the Parliament endorses the commitment by its predecessor on 1 June 2000 to reinstate the Borders railway from Edinburgh to Carlisle; notes the Liberal Democrats' election pledge to fund this line, and therefore expects all parties within the Executive to make an unequivocal commitment to finance the line.
S2M-4 Borders Railway (lodged on 7 May 2003) Ms Sandra White*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Bruce McFee*
S2M-4 Borders Railway (lodged on 7 May 2003) Stewart Stevenson*, Stewart Maxwell*, Michael Matheson*, Jim Mather*
S2M-4 Borders Railway (lodged on 7 May 2003) Robin Harper*
S2M-4 Borders Railway (lodged on 7 May 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-4 Borders Railway (lodged on 7 May 2003) Bruce Crawford*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Alasdair Morgan*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4 Borders Railway (lodged on 7 May 2003) Alex Neil*
S2M-4 Borders Railway (lodged on 7 May 2003) Brian Adam*
